name: flickr.machinetags.getPairs
description: Return a list of unique namespace and predicate pairs, optionally limited by predicate or namespace, in alphabetical order.
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: namespace
arguments.description: Limit the list of pairs returned to those that have the following namespace.

arguments.name: predicate
arguments.description: Limit the list of pairs returned to those that have the following predicate.

arguments.name: per_page
arguments.description: Number of photos to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.

arguments.name: page
arguments.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

response:
<pairs page="1" total="1228" perpage="500" pages="3">
  <pair namespace="aero" predicate="airline" usage="1093">aero:airline</pair>
  <pair namespace="aero" predicate="icao" usage="4">aero:icao</pair>
  <pair namespace="aero" predicate="model" usage="1026">aero:model</pair>
  <pair namespace="aero" predicate="tail" usage="1048">aero:tail</pair>
</pairs>
